channel.title: Scene Understanding on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Scene Understanding on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: CrossOver: 3D Scene Cross-Modal Alignment
item.description: CrossOver: Flexible scene-level cross-modal alignment via modality-agnostic embeddings, unlocking robust 3D scene understanding.

item.title: KITAB-Bench: A Comprehensive Multi-Domain Benchmark for Arabic OCR and Document Understanding
item.description: KITAB-Bench: A new multi-domain Arabic OCR benchmark to bridge the performance gap with English OCR technologies.

item.title: Geolocation with Real Human Gameplay Data: A Large-Scale Dataset and Human-Like Reasoning Framework
item.description: New geolocation dataset & reasoning framework enhance accuracy and interpretability by leveraging human gameplay data.
